#include<iostream>
#include<cstdio>
#include<string>
using namespace std;
#define ll long long int
#define mod 1000000007
int main()
{
    int t;
    cin>>t;
    while(t--)
    {
        string pl,g;
        cin>>pl>>g;
        int l=g.length();
        int s=0;
        int ar[30]={0};
        for(int i=0;i<l;i++)
        {
            int a='a';
            int b=g[i];
            ar[b-a]++;
        }
        for(int i=0;i<=26;i++)
           s=s^ar[i];
        if(s==0)
        {
            if(pl[0]=='T')
                cout<<"Varun"<<endl;
            else
                cout<<"Tarun"<<endl;
        }
        else
            cout<<pl<<endl;

    }
}
